item.title: D.C. Council member Janeese Lewis George announces run for mayor
item.description: D.C . Council member Janeese Lewis George announced Monday that she will run for mayor next year.

item.title: New study finds states with highest taxes have fastest rates of residents moving away

item.title: N.Y. Attorney General Letitia James hit with ethics complaint after mortgage fraud case dismissed

item.title: Trump says he's settled on a Federal Reserve chair pick and will announce it soon
item.description: President Trump says he knows who he will appoint to lead the Federal Reserve.
